Articles.Content: I just landed on Vall, it's not really getting any attention but it is truly unique. Seeing Jool and sometimes Tylo or Laythe in the night sky is really amazing. Have any of you landed on Vall? If you haven't here are some screenshots to show you what it may just be like for you.

I put a rover down on Vall a few days ago:

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/Kct5w/embed"></iframe>
Yes, I think Vall is my new favorite world.

This wasn't a pain to set up at all.

Is it possible to set up a flyby of all of Jool's moons?
Sigh... I got to flyby around vall, but never got there. I landed on tylo... a probe.

This wasn't a pain to set up at all.

Is it possible to set up a flyby of all of Jool's moons?

My god the amount of work that must have taken.. Very nicely done, professional quality screenshot.

Vall is nice. Bin there.

Tylo is the most overlooked IMO
The easter egg on Valls one of the best in the Joolian system imo
You should crash into that boulder and see if it says you crashed into the Magic Boulder. I have also heard of a monolith formation on Vall, never found it though.

You should crash into that boulder and see if it says you crashed into the Magic Boulder. I have also heard of a monolith formation on Vall, never found it though.

What boulder? I see jool and laythe in the sky in the first pic, but that's it.
